net.jawr.web.taglib.jsf
Class AbstractHtmlImageTag

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          javax.faces.component.UIOutput
              net.jawr.web.taglib.jsf.ImagePathTag
                  net.jawr.web.taglib.jsf.AbstractHtmlImageTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.component.ValueHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageInputTag, ImgHtmlTag
public abstract class AbstractHtmlImageTag
extends ImagePathTag

Abstract implementation of a facelets taglib component which will display images.

Author:
Ibrahim Chaehoi
